pkgmetadata.longdescription: autojenkins===========Automation (remote control) of Jenkins tasks.Things you can do with it:* Create a job (e.g. from a template job)* Delete a job* Enable or disable a job* Obtain the ``config.xml`` file for that job* Trigger building of a job* Obtain latest execution results* ...AutoJenkins can be used both as an API and a command-line tool.Supports non-authenticated as well as authenticated servers.
